``` {r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, messages=FALSE, results='hide'}
library(knitr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plyr)
library(dplyr, warn.conflicts=FALSE)
library(lubridate, warn.conflicts=FALSE)

opts_chunk$set(fig.align='center', echo=FALSE)

pg_conf <- read.csv('rds_settings', stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
vs_db <- src_postgres(dbname='vitalsigns', host=pg_conf$host,
                      user=pg_conf$user, password=pg_conf$pass,
                      port=pg_conf$port)

ffs_soils <- tbl(vs_db, 'farmfieldsoils_processed') %>% data.frame
eplot_soils <- tbl(vs_db, 'eplotsoils_processed') %>% data.frame

all_soils <- rbind.fill(ffs_soils[ , c('country', 'landscape_no', 'eplot_no', 'hh_no')],
                        eplot_soils[ , c('country', 'landscape_no', 'eplot_no')])
                                

```

Report generated `r now(tzone='UTC')` UTC.

## Number soil samples by country

``` {r, fig.align="center"}
soils_cty <- group_by(all_soils, country) %>%
    summarise(count=n()) %>%
    print(n=50)
ggplot(soils_cty) +
    geom_bar(aes(country, count, fill=country), stat='identity') +
    xlab("Country") + ylab("Number of Processed Samples")
```

## Number of soil samples by landscape

``` {r, fig.align="center"}
soils_l <- group_by(ffs_soils, country, landscape_no) %>%
    summarise(count=n()) %>%
    arrange(country, landscape_no) %>%
    collect() %>%
    print(n=50)
ggplot(soils_l) +
    geom_bar(aes(factor(landscape_no), count, fill=country), stat='identity') +
    facet_grid(country ~ .) +
    xlab("Landscape") + ylab("Number of Processed Samples")
```
